item.title: Hugo How-tos
item.description: How do you install Hugo? The easiest way is to use the Chocolatey package manager if you are on Windows. If you haven’t already install Chocolatey. To check if it is installed already use the following command: choco version If you do not see an error than it is installed. Otherwise navigate to the PM’s website and follow the instructions. To install Hugo using Chocolatey use the following command:
